Articles.Content:
For those rocket builders who can't get the break away shells to work easily but still want to lob sats into space accurately.

Parts needed:

Latest Nova/Sunday packs + Vari's Big Effen 2m engine.

Rocket Notes:

Flys decent very little wobble if any, great for getting BXs-7 Satellite in circ orbs up to 250,000m. (Recommended orbs 55Km-150km).

If you guys like this one I have several other semi-ATLAS style rockets that track nicely too that I can upload.
